text: Ba re: “Tseo tse kahar’e ho limpa tsa likhomo tseo tse joalo li boloketsoe banna ba rona, li hanetsoe basali ba rona; empa haeba li ka tsoala lifolotsana, bohle ba tla ba le seabo ho tsona. Ruri Allah U tla ba putsa ho latela tumela-masaoana eo ea bona ea melaoana eo e fosahetseng khahlanong le Eena. U Seli, U Tsebo e felletseng
